name: Tronic Force
overview: A puzzle game developed by Twice Effects and published in Magic Disk 64 1995/03. Instructions for TRONIC FORCE TRONIC FORCE is a special kind of logic game. The point is to recreate a pattern displayed by the computer with the help of stones. But stones can only be moved according to a given pattern, which makes things tricky. To move rows vertically or horizontally, the arrow is brought to the edge of the playing field at the height of the row of stones to be moved and the fire button is pressed. The row is now shifted in the corresponding direction. So that it doesn't get too difficult, the stones can change their color by clicking on the desired stone with the arrow and the fire button. A level is over as soon as the stones on the large playing area of the handicap in the lower right corner of the screen correspond.
